resources.string: This app allows you to listen to KALX Berkeley 90.7 FM radio on your Android phone.\n\n KALX Berkeley 90.7 FM broadcasts freeform radio 24 hours a day to the San Francisco Bay Area. It is a University of California and listener-supported radio station with a focus on alternative programming. KALX Berkeley 90.7 FM is licensed to the Regents of the University of California.
